title: Best of the Program | Guests: Herschel Walker & Bill O’Reilly | 10/21/22
description:
Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker joins to discuss why he’s confident tthe attacks against him by Big Tech and the media won’t work. Bill O’Reilly explains why he believes the media’s midterm coverage is way off and gives his take on special counsel John Durham as his investigation wraps up. “Your Welcome” host Michael Malice reveals his favorite candidate of the year and the biggest campaign surprises so far.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
